column4: i upgraded to karmic and my wireless disappeared. I can't even see the (broadcom) card in the output of lspci. what should I do now?
have you tried looking for the drivers with the driver tool provided in Ubuntu?
yes, and the only drivers listed are for nvidia. Next, I tried getting the sta driver and then the b43-fwcutter and still nothing except nvidia is listed in the hardware drivers
can you sent that offer again? i made a mistake accept it
